type.description: The namespace and ID of the desired Power Type.

name.description:
The display name of the power.
Can be a literal string or a translation key.

description.description:
The description of the power.
Can be a literal string or a translation key.

hidden.description: If set to true, this power will not be displayed in the power list of the origin.

condition.description: If set, this power will only be active when the player with this power fulfills the condition.

loading_priority.description:
Specifies when this power is loaded.
Higher numbers mean it's loaded later, which means it will override those with lower loading priorities which share the same ID.

badges.description: If set, it will display icon(s) after the name of the power.

items.description: An Object which displays an icon just after the name of a power in the power list from the Origins GUI.

sprite.description: ID of the texture to be displayed as an icon. See the List of sprites for a list of files included by default in the mod.

text.description: The string to display when you hover over the icon.
